title: Font logo for a pizza restaurant.
content:
This logo was designed this year by someone in the Philadelphia area. the marketing company designed it help the owner print a menu and disappeared. I am trying to build a website for the owner. Thank you for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416031327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Small%20log%20Spatola's_5039.jpg)
